title: Mac won't open after 7.10 path
body: The title says it all. The game won't open. I did everything. I talked with a support and followed all the guidelines he sent to me with no successful results. I even formatted my mac praying that it would fix things, but nothing changed. At this point, I think something is wrong in the 7.10 patch and I suggest you check it out because I noticed a lot of people who use mac can't play league anymore since the new patch is out.

replies.body: please. riot. at least make an overall thread to let us know that you are aware of this problem and are trying to finish. its not like you to leave a good part of your community unrecognized :/

I have the same issue. I'm on a Mac (mid 2007) 10.11.6 El Capitan and every time i click the league button it bounces one time, another league symbol comes for half a second and then disappears. If i start the old client and click on launch the new client, it also does nothing. I tried HRT without luck, and i know i have a stable wired connection. I understand it takes some time to gather data and find a solution. I hope you guys work out what the problem is, I really enjoy my time on the rift :)

Cheers

I have the same issue that it dos nothing after hitting the launch . i tryed  everything in the last 2 days to fix it with uninstalling / reinstalling clean mac/ checked all connection etc etc even put back to factory settings and installed all new, im using mac with ElCapitan., im very sad i cant play especcially because i got my days off now and i cant play in team with my friends :( , I hope riot can fix the problem soon, but it would be nice for them maby to right something to us mac users that they realised there is an issue with the latest patch for mac users. i cant stop trying more more things on my mac that maby could fix the problem and i can play..  I just hope it can be fixed soon than ill be jumping a big hole in the roof :)
{{champion:105}}

You mentioned talking to support and following some guides, did you have a ticket number?  Submitting a ticket was a solid step, our tech guys can help resolve your issue individually.  They'll likely have more context to your specific problem as well if you've already been corresponding with them.  My thought, though, is that a [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) problem would prevent your game from launcher.  Keep speaking with them in your ticket to get this fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Rf6eMh0u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-19T20:32:18.648+0000)

Keep speaking with them in your ticket to get this fixed up!

YoU meNTioNed TaLkiNG tO SuPPoRt aNd fOLlowINg soME GuIDeS, dID YoU hAVe a TIcKeT NuMBeR?  SuBmiTTinG a TiCKeT wAs a SoLiD STeP, oUR tECh gUyS CaN HElp ReSoLvE YOuR iSSuE inDIviDuaLLy.  ThEy'LL lIKelY hAVe mORe CoNteXT tO YoUr SPeCifIC pRObLeM aS wELl iF YoU've AlrEAdY bEEn cORreSpoNdinG wITh tHeM.  My tHouGHt, tHOugH, is tHaT a CoNnEcTiOn ISsueS pRobLeM wOuLD pReVeNT YOur gAmE fROm LaUnCheR.  KeEp sPEaKInG wItH ThEM iN YoUr tiCKEt tO GeT thIS fIXeD uP!

We've all tried the connections issues solutions. They don't work. Something went wrong with the 7.10 patch and now Mac users can't open it. Please let out a fix.

Myself, Broporo, and player support have all reached out to assist  you.  The time you took trying to throw this meme at me could have been spent on going through those steps and resolving your issue.   https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/cache/71/31/713175884f15ec7533261bc08d255e6d.png

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Rf6eMh0u,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-05-20T15:57:59.738+0000)
>
> Myself, Broporo, and player support have all reached out to assist  you.  The time you took trying to throw this meme at me could have been spent on going through those steps and resolving your issue.   https://emojipedia-us.s3.amazonaws.com/cache/71/31/713175884f15ec7533261bc08d255e6d.png

No one is upset that you're not trying to assist, I myself have Ludus Bonus helping me with my ticket at the moment as well. However would it be that difficult to make a post acknowledging to the Mac player base that you're aware of some issues with the client not launching and that you're all working hard on resolving? 

By the way, I noticed Broporo mentioned in another thread that some users who were able to upgrade to Sierra OS were able to launch the client. However for users who have Imac 20o7 potatoes....that isn't possible. Hopefully some kind of resolution comes to fruition

I promise that I will absolutely get info out and keep each other updated with issues as often as I can, including posts.  Right now, though, I haven't heard anything back about this specific issue.  It could absolutely be an emerging problem, but we need to take steps to collect info and rule out possibilities as either a resolution or offering of proof that something just well might be happening.  That starts with basic troubleshooting.  The difficult part would be to just claim a widespread or potential new problem, without any backing.  

I've collected and forwarded the info I've received from you guys over the day, but haven't been able to confirm anything yet.  If there is something going on, I'll definitely put up a post once we're all clear about it.  I gotchu.
I've already gone through all the steps, so I can spend as much time as I like really throwing memes at whoever... Just waiting on Riot to acknowledge that there's a problem.

Why send a ticket when I already talked with a support through a chat? I've talked to two different Italian supports since you know I'm Italian and after following a bunch of guidelines that I don't have the link anymore since I formatted the mac they told me that they couldn't help me anymore because they tried everything. One of the guidelines was the connection one that you keep sending to people saying that the problem might be that. Well, it's not. I did everything the page asked and nothing changed. I have a potato macbook pro 17 inches 2.4ghz with El Capitan. I can't update to Sierra unfortunately. I really like this game and I'm very upset that I might not be able to play it for a very long time (aka until I have enough money to buy me a new pc) because of this problem. Fix this for all mac players please.
Fix this. Every support ticket I submit is marked as "Solved" then ignored.
Exactly. Then they give a bs response saying it's our connection. ._.
Still no fix.... Losing what little faith I had in Riot Games...

Got the same issue!

When the patch rolled out, the patching process glitched at the end and i had to reinstal.

however, the game keep disapearing after i click play on the lolpatcherux.
I tryed the hextectool (force patch, force reinstall and so on), i tryed to fix the instal using the option un the help subsection of the patcher... i even reinstalled from the web site and NOTHING worked...

Last time this append, i stop playing L.O.L. for 2 years becose i was pissed by the lack off help we received as mac user. 

Plz do something to fix this!

For info, i roll a imac mid-2007 on OSX 10.9.5 (maverick)
